title: [Client] Can't log in, pls help.
body:
Hey riot. My client was working fine this morning, I played a few games and everything was working fine. But when I launched it again in the afternoon, I couldn't log in for some reason. 

I tried using [Initiate Full Repair], but it said it couldn't find the problem.

I can't download Hextech Repair tool since I can't access any of riot's website.

I tried submitting a ticket, but I can't connect to any of riot's website. 

My internet provider is TPG, and it seems like I have no trouble connecting to any other website/servers.

I tried using 3G (Hotspot from phone) to login, and it worked somehow.

I also tried removing firewall, looks like it didn't work.

Pls fix asap :(

[[A screenshot of my client]](https://s24.postimg.org/nbkzfisdh/Screenshot_7.png)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Not being able to access any of riots sites makes me think this is related to your DNS, could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me. Let me know if this helps at all.
